thread.title: 'The Jungle Book' wins award for Visual Effects | Zee News
thread.title_full: 'The Jungle Book' wins award for Visual Effects | Zee News

title: 'The Jungle Book' wins award for Visual Effects | Zee News
text:
'The Jungle Book' wins award for Visual Effects By Gayatri Sankar | Last Updated: Monday, February 27, 2017 - 09:35 Zee Media Bureau Comment 
One of the most prestigious film awards ceremony - the 89th Academy Awards is being held at Hollywood`s Dolby Theatre. The gala event attended by the who's who of Hollywood is being hosed by late night talk show host Jimmy Kimmel. Latest Updates 
John Legend is performing now. 09:33 AM 
Emma Watson and Ryan Gosling are on stage announce John Legend's performance. 09:31 AM 
The trolls online are being "acknowledged" by celebrities. They are reading out mean tweets! 09:28 AM 
Meryl Streep announces Best Cinematography award. Linus Sandgren bags award for ‘La La Land’. 09:27 AM 
Meryl Streep is on stage now. 09:20 AM 
— Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) 27 February 2017 09:19 AM 
Kimmel takes a dig at President Donald Trump by showing audiences a glimpse of his Twitter timeline. 09:17 AM 
And the Oscar for Best Live Action Short for 'Sing' 09:13 AM 
The award for Best Documentary Short Subject goes to 'The White Helmets' 09:08 AM
